Desc.entry: World class facility which welcomes community, sport organisations and elite athletes. There are sports and coached activity sessions available to all, which include badminton, volley ball, netball, athletics, table tennis, boxing sessions, martial arts, basketball and school holiday clubs plus much more for families, adults and children. The venue has a health and fitness centre with state of the art gym and spa which is open to the public.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-10pm, Sat and Sun 9am-5pm (general opening times), Mon-Fri 7am-9pm, Sat & Sun 9am-5pm (Valley opening times)
